title: I want to start or join an Indian pop band. Is there anyone interested (age should be around 17 to 22)? - Quora

response.answer_text: I am also interested. I want to become a vocalist. I am currently 17, but I will be turning 18 soon this November. You can DM me on Instagram. My username - this.is.sj.here
Yes im really interested. I can sing, rap and write english lyrics. Im also trying to learn dance and piano. I will be turning 18 soon. Let me know if when ur going to this soon.
